hadiths.text: It was narrated from Ibn Umar that the Messenger of Allah said:"There are five (animals) for which there is no sin on the Muhrim if he kills them: Crows, kites, scorpions, mice and vicious dogs

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا يَقْتُلُ الْمُحْرِمُ مِنَ الدَّوَابِّ قَتْلُ الْكَلْبِ الْعَقُورِ .
chapter.eng-name: Animals That May Be Killed By The Muhrim: Killing Vicious Dogs
